intro.title: UNTP Introduction
intro.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.

UNTP_Getting_Started/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
UNTP_Getting_Started/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

UNTP_Getting_Started/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
UNTP_Getting_Started/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

UNTP_Getting_Started/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
UNTP_Getting_Started/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

UNTP_Getting_Started/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
UNTP_Getting_Started/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

UNTP_Getting_Started/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
UNTP_Getting_Started/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

UNTP_Getting_Started/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
UNTP_Getting_Started/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.
